mapper.select: SELECT * FROM agile_work_log WHERE issue_id = #{issueId} and project_id = #{projectId} order by creation_date desc

SELECT awl.log_id, awl.work_time, awl.start_date, awl.created_by FROM agile_work_log awl JOIN agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr ON awl.issue_id = aisr.issue_id AND aisr.project_id = awl.project_id WHERE aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND awl.start_date >= #{startDate} AND awl.start_date <= #{endDate}
SELECT issue_id, count(log_id) workLogCount, IFNULL(SUM(work_time), 0) workTimeCount FROM agile_work_log WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND issue_id = #{issueId}
